questionData.question: Do you Have any prior Felony or Criminal Charges
Have you worked for Fedex Before?
If worked for Fedex then what is your Fedex ID, Contractor Name and Terminal address
Do you have an existing DOT Medical card ( MEC) ?
Do you have reliable transportation to get to the job everyday?
Where are you currently working and why are you looking to change?
Will you be able to Pass a Background verification check, Drug Test and a Physical test?

If Fedex Experience, explore track record with Fedex - any accidents?  Fired by other contractors? History of complaints/violations? Attendance record with other contractors, such as number of call outs with contractor in a year.
